title: The Firefly 2.5 Turns A Wheelchair Into A Power Scooter
description: For wheelchair users seeking greater mobility and independence, the Firefly 2.5 Electric Scooter by Rio Mobility offers an innovative solution. This powerful attachment converts a manual wheelchair into a fully motorized scooter, allowing users to navigate streets, parks, and even off-road terrain with ease. Designed for quick and seamless attachment after initial setup, the Firefly 2.5 provides a smooth, high-performance ride tailored to individual needs.

html:
For wheelchair users seeking greater mobility and independence, the Firefly 2.5 Electric Scooter by Rio Mobility offers an innovative solution. This powerful attachment converts a manual wheelchair into a fully motorized scooter, allowing users to navigate streets, parks, and even off-road terrain with ease. Designed for quick and seamless attachment after initial setup, the Firefly 2.5 provides a smooth, high-performance ride tailored to individual needs.

Equipped with a 350-watt motor and five-speed modes, the Firefly 2.5 can reach speeds of up to 12 mph. Its removable lithium-ion battery offers a 16-mile range on a full charge, with a USB-A port for charging devices on the go. Users can choose between road or off-road tires, ensuring the best fit for their lifestyle. With a starting price of $2,649, the Firefly 2.5 is a game-changer for those looking to enhance their mobility.
